summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a draft cover letter for MILs (likely Motions In Limine) in a case, with an attached document concerning proposed redactions. It appears to be internal legal correspondence related to case preparation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email sending a draft cover letter for MILs (Motions In Limine) regarding proposed redactions.

events.title: Draft Cover Letter for MILs Prepared
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a draft cover letter regarding proposed redactions to MILs (Motions In Limine), saved in the Correspondence folder.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated October 18, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
It concerns a draft cover letter for MILs (Motions In Limine) related to proposed redactions in a case.
The correspondence is from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The email references an attached document titled '2021-10-18_Govtletter_re_Proposed_Redactions_to_MILs_v1.docx'.
The sender notes highlighting 'Section X' as a placeholder that might change, suggesting draft legal work.
